Package entrants.utils.graph

Class AgentKnowledge

  • java.lang.Object
    • entrants.utils.graph.AgentKnowledge
  • public class AgentKnowledge
extends java.lang.Object
    This class serves to store what an agent knows about its es environment & the other agents.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      AgentKnowledge​(pacman.game.Constants.GHOST owner)
      Initializes an agent's knowledge with an empty graph.

    • Method Summary

      Retrieves the descriptions that the agent has about all the ghosts.
      UndirectedGraph<Node,Edge> getGraph()
      Retrieves the graph of the agent.

      Retrieves the knowledge that the agent has about itself.

    • Constructor Detail

      • AgentKnowledge

        public AgentKnowledge​(pacman.game.Constants.GHOST owner)
        Initializes an agent's knowledge with an empty graph.
        Parameters:
        owner - The ghost that owns the knowledge. If it's PacMan's knowledge specify a null value.

    • Method Detail

      • getGraph

        public UndirectedGraph<Node,Edge> getGraph()
        Retrieves the graph of the agent.
        Returns:
        The agent's graph.

      • getKnowledgeAboutMySelf

        public AgentDescription getKnowledgeAboutMySelf()
        Retrieves the knowledge that the agent has about itself.
        Returns:
        An AgentDescription object representing what the agent knows about itself. If the owner is PacMan, the returned object is also an instance of PacManDescription If the owner is a ghost, the returned object is also an instance of GhostDescription

      • getPacManDescription

        public PacManDescription getPacManDescription()
        Retrieves the description that the current agent has about PacMan
        Returns:
        A PacManDescription object

      • getGhostDescription

        public GhostDescription getGhostDescription​(pacman.game.Constants.GHOST ghost)
        Retrieves the description that the agent has about a particular ghost
        Parameters:
        ghost - The ghost whose description is desired
        Returns:
        The desired ghost's description

      • getGhostsDescription

        public java.util.Map<pacman.game.Constants.GHOST,GhostDescription> getGhostsDescription()
        Retrieves the descriptions that the agent has about all the ghosts.
        Returns:
        The ghosts descriptions. Note that the received HashMap is a copy of the one that is maintained in the AgentKnowledge

      • getOwner

        public pacman.game.Constants.GHOST getOwner()
        Retrieves the owner of the knowledge
        Returns:
        The Ghost owning the knowledge, if it is owned by PacMan, a null value is returned
